-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A structured logger for Fluentd (Haskell)
--   
@package fluent-logger
@version 0.2.3.1


-- | For compatibility with msgpack
module Network.Fluent.Logger.Packable

-- | MessagePackable
--   
--   Since 0.2.0.0
class Packable a
pack :: Packable a => a -> Object
instance [incoherent] (Packable k, Packable v) => Packable (Map k v)
instance [incoherent] (Packable a1, Packable a2, Packable a3, Packable a4, Packable a5) => Packable (a1, a2, a3, a4, a5)
instance [incoherent] (Packable a1, Packable a2, Packable a3, Packable a4) => Packable (a1, a2, a3, a4)
instance [incoherent] (Packable a1, Packable a2, Packable a3) => Packable (a1, a2, a3)
instance [incoherent] (Packable a1, Packable a2) => Packable (a1, a2)
instance [incoherent] Packable a => Packable (Vector a)
instance [incoherent] Packable a => Packable [a]
instance [incoherent] Packable Text
instance [incoherent] Packable Text
instance [incoherent] Packable ByteString
instance [incoherent] Packable ByteString
instance [incoherent] Packable String
instance [incoherent] Packable Int
instance [incoherent] Packable ()
instance [incoherent] Packable Object


-- | Fluent Logger for Haskell
module Network.Fluent.Logger

-- | Fluent logger
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
data FluentLogger

-- | Create a fluent logger and run given action.
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
withFluentLogger :: FluentSettings -> (FluentLogger -> IO a) -> IO a

-- | Create a fluent logger
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
newFluentLogger :: FluentSettings -> IO FluentLogger

-- | Close logger
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
closeFluentLogger :: FluentLogger -> IO ()

-- | Fluent logger settings
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
data FluentSettings
FluentSettings :: ByteString -> ByteString -> Int -> Double -> Int64 -> FluentSettings
fluentSettingsTag :: FluentSettings -> ByteString
fluentSettingsHost :: FluentSettings -> ByteString
fluentSettingsPort :: FluentSettings -> Int
fluentSettingsTimeout :: FluentSettings -> Double
fluentSettingsBufferLimit :: FluentSettings -> Int64

-- | Default fluent logger settings
--   
--   Since 0.1.0.0
defaultFluentSettings :: FluentSettings

-- | Post a message.
--   
--   Since 0.2.0.0
post :: Packable a => FluentLogger -> ByteString -> a -> IO ()

-- | Post a message with given time.
--   
--   Since 0.2.0.0
postWithTime :: Packable a => FluentLogger -> ByteString -> Int -> a -> IO ()
